N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 18 ยง 453.3 - General requirements for operation

State Regulations
(a) In addition to the requirements specified
in Part 452 of this Title, buildings, equipment and services must be adequate
to meet the physical and social needs of all residents and to protect their
health, safety, comfort, and well-being. (b) Programs must comply with all applicable
local and State codes, regulations, ordinances and laws relating to health, safety, sanitation, fire prevention and building standards. (c) All requirements of this Part and Part
452 of this Title must be met unless an exception has been granted pursuant to
section
452.3
